title: (x) 'Lifestyles guide' Calligraphy Font - P22 Cezanne {Craig}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202014024im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lifestyle%20Graphic_4934.jpg)

Can anyone identify this font? And possibly know where to locate it free of charge?

Thanks,  
Cole

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Lifestyle Graphic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202014024/http:/typophile.com/files/Lifestyle%20Graphic_0.jpg) | 65.82 KB |
author: dmbrules909

comments.content: It's [Cezanne](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202014024/http:/www.p22.com/products/cezanne.html), which is not free but is presently on sale.
